author: Dalai Lama
message: The greatest antidote to insecurity and the sense of fear is compassion it brings one back to the basis of one's inner strength
title: Thought of the day

message: Courage is the discovery that you may not win, and trying when you know you can lose.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: To be thoughtful and kind only takes a few seconds compared to the timeless hurt caused by one rude gesture.
title: Thought of the day

author: Mortimer Adler
message: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds, unlike our bodies, can continue growing as we continue to live.
title: Thought of the day
